Title: Monte Carlo
Writer: Thomas Bezucha (screenplay), April Blair (screenplay), Maria Maggenti (screenplay), Kelly Bowe (screen story), Jules Bass (novel)
Actors: Selena Gomez, Katie Cassidy, Leighton Meester, Cory Monteith
Plot: Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.
